title: GG system.
body:
Just finished a game where  I was jungling twitch. my red gets invaded, no biggie, so i go to my blue. darius doesn't ping mia, poppy invades my blue. i'm behind. OK

Darius afks and i'm stuck at level 1 while the rest of the map just hit 5. First tower gone. Time on deck: 6 minutes.

Second tower goes down a few seconds later. This game is over.

I walk around fountian because the score is a lot to a very little, i get TWO afk notices, WHILE MY CHAMPION IS MOVING. I am TYPING IN CHAT. I AM NOT AFK. 

Match ends around 18 minutes. WHY DO I GET FLAGGED FOR AFK/LEAVERBUSTER AND PLACED IN A LOW PRIORITY QUEUE?!  

I'm pretty flipping tilted.

replies.body: So you're mad at the system... for doing what it's supposed to do?

...

Moving around typing is not better than literally being away from keyboard. "AFK" isn't literal, it means you aren't participating in the match, and you will be punished the same. I recommend continuing to participate in the match; if you have two afk's I understand why you would want to end the inevitably lost game as soon as possible, but you can just farm passively. If your teammates return you won't be as far behind, and if they don't the enemy can still push for the win faster.

that's the thing. at that point, my jungle was no longer mine and i could not farm passively without feeding. stepping near my turrets with me 7 levels behind would result in an ensuing tower dive and another easy kill for the enemy team. standing on fountain prevented me from feeding. but whatever. Next time i'll just attempt to farm and feed, causing the enemy team to just wait for respawns for easy kill counts. GG
